ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: Good perspective on some topics- others seemed like basic knowledge.
Great to know information (mandatory). Useful and thoughtful class.
Provides a great overall introduction to ethical situations. More importantly, it provides references and resources of whom to contact in the case a situation arises.
The course provided a helpful overview of topics pertinent to research ethics. I found the sessions on HIC and grant-writing particularly useful.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Christian Tschudi  Great getting to know the director a little better and hearing abt his opinion on publishing and such.
Instructor: Christian Tschudi  Chris knows the material very well and engaging.
Instructor: Christian Tschudi  He was very helpful with detailed lectures. He was more than happy to answer any questions and provided a unique perspective.
Instructor: Christian Tschudi  The instructor was extremely knowledgeable and provided insight into how ethics plays a critical role in our career as researchers.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This course is a useful class for anyone in the public health field.
Great course - would definitely recommend it.
